title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Dave Wannstedt on Flores Lawsuit, Harbaugh NFL Interest + "Fake Q's, Real Answers on Tanking Owners, UFO's
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Dave Wannstedt on Flores Lawsuit, Harbaugh NFL Interest + "Fake Q's, Real Answers on Tanking Owners, UFO's
description:
Colin does Fake Questions, Real Answers (3:00) on why Jim Harbaugh didn't get the Vikings job, why an NFL owner would ask a coach to lose games, how college football reminds him of the HBO show "True Detective", and his most controversial take ever. Then, former Dolphins & Bears HC Dave Wannstedt joins Colin to discuss the Brian Flores' lawsuit (18:00), how his refusal to tank cost him his job in Miami (22:00), concerns about new Bears HC Matt Eberflus (28:00), which AFC team should roll the dice on Jimmy G (32:00), why Cowboys HC Mike McCarthy struggles with clock management (35:00), why Dave wanted Jim Harbaugh to coach the Chicago Bears, and why he thought Harbaugh would join the Minnesota Vikings (40:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
